table.name: attachment
table.remarks: Extension to the LADM used by SOLA to store claim files attachments.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Identifier for the attachment.

column.name: type_code
column.remarks: Attached document type code.

column.name: reference_nr
column.remarks: Document reference number.

column.name: document_date
column.remarks: Document date.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Short document description.

column.name: body
column.remarks: Binary content of the attachment.

column.name: size
column.remarks: File size.

column.name: mime_type
column.remarks: Mime type of the attachment.

column.name: file_name
column.remarks: Actual file name of the attachment.

column.name: file_extension
column.remarks: File extension of the attachment. E.g. pdf, tiff, doc, etc

column.name: user_name
column.remarks: User's ID, who has created the attachment.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the document_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: attachment_chunk
table.remarks: Holds temporary pieces of attachment uploaded on the server. In case of large files, document can be split into smaller pieces (chunks) allowing reliable upload. After all pieces uploaded, client will instruct server to create a document and remove temporary files stored in this table.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Unique ID of the chunk

column.name: attachment_id
column.remarks: Attachment ID, which will be used to create final document object. Used to group all chunks together.

column.name: claim_id
column.remarks: Claim ID. Used to clean the table when saving claim. It will guarantee that no orphan chunks left in the table.

column.name: start_position
column.remarks: Staring position of the byte in the source/destination document

column.name: size
column.remarks: Size of the chunk in bytes.

column.name: body
column.remarks: The content of the chunk.

column.name: md5
column.remarks: Checksum of the chunk, calculated using MD5.

column.name: creation_time
column.remarks: Date and time when chuck was created.

column.name: user_name
column.remarks: User's id (name), who has loaded the chunk

table.name: claim
table.remarks: Main table to store claim and claim challenge information submitted by the community recorders. SOLA Open Tenure extention.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Identifier for the claim.

column.name: nr
column.remarks: Auto generated claim number. Generated by the generate-claim-nr business rule when the claim record is initially saved.

column.name: lodgement_date
column.remarks: The lodgement date and time of the claim.

column.name: challenge_expiry_date
column.remarks: Expiration date when challenge claim can be submitted.

column.name: decision_date
column.remarks: The decision date on the claim by the authority.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Free description of the claim.

column.name: challenged_claim_id
column.remarks: The identifier of the challenged claim. If this value is provided, it means the record is a claim challenge type.

column.name: claimant_id
column.remarks: The identifier of the claimant.

column.name: mapped_geometry
column.remarks: Claimed property geometry calculated using system SRID

column.name: gps_geometry
column.remarks: Claimed property geometry in Lat/Long format

column.name: status_code
column.remarks: The status of the claim.

column.name: recorder_name
column.remarks: User's ID, who has created the claim.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the claim_historic table.

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

column.name: type_code
column.remarks: Type of claim (e.g. ownership, usufruct, occupation).

column.name: start_date
column.remarks: Start date of right (occupation)

column.name: land_use_code
column.remarks: Land use code

column.name: notes
column.remarks: Any note that could be usefully stored as part of the claim

column.name: north_adjacency
column.remarks: Optional information about adjacency on the north

column.name: south_adjacency
column.remarks: Optional information about adjacency on the south

column.name: east_adjacency
column.remarks: Optional information about adjacency on the east

column.name: west_adjacency
column.remarks: Optional information about adjacency on the west

column.name: assignee_name
column.remarks: User name who is assigned to work with claim

column.name: rejection_reason_code
column.remarks: Rejection reason code.

column.name: claim_area
column.remarks: Claim area in square meters.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Identifier for the claim comment.

column.name: claim_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the claim.

column.name: comment
column.remarks: Comment text.

column.name: comment_user
column.remarks: The user id who has created comment.

column.name: creation_time
column.remarks: The date and time when comment was created.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the claim_historic table.

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Identifier for the claim location.

column.name: claim_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the claim.

column.name: mapped_location
column.remarks: Additional claim location geometry.

column.name: gps_location
column.remarks: Additional claim location geometry in Lat/Long format.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Claim location description.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the claim_historic table.

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: claim_share
table.remarks: Identifies the share a party has in a claim.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Identifier for the claim share.

column.name: claim_id
column.remarks: Identifier of the claim the share is assocaited with.

column.name: nominator
column.remarks: Nominiator part of the share (i.e. top number of fraction)

column.name: denominator
column.remarks: Denominator part of the share (i.e. bottom number of fraction)

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the claim_share_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

column.name: percentage
column.remarks: Percentage of the share. Another form of nominator/denominator presentation.

table.name: claim_status
table.remarks: Code list of claim status.

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the claim status.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the claim status.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the service claim.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the claim status.

table.name: claim_uses_attachment
table.remarks: Links the claim to the attachment submitted with the claim. SOLA Open Tenure extension.

column.name: claim_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the claim the record is associated to.

column.name: attachment_id
column.remarks: Identifier of the attachment associated to the claim.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Unique row identifier.

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: field_constraint
table.remarks: Dynamic form field constraint.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Primary key.

column.name: name
column.remarks: Field name to be used as UI component name.

column.name: display_name
column.remarks: Value to be used as a visible text (header) of UI component.

column.name: error_msg
column.remarks: Error message to display in case of constraint violation.

column.name: format
column.remarks: Regular expression, used to check field value

column.name: min_value
column.remarks: Minimum field value, used in range constraint.

column.name: max_value
column.remarks: Maximum field value, used in range constraint.

column.name: field_constraint_type
column.remarks: Type of constraint.

column.name: field_template_id
column.remarks: Field template id, which constraint relates to.

table.name: field_constraint_option
table.remarks: Dynamic form field constraint option, used to limit field values.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Primary key.

column.name: name
column.remarks: Field name to be used as UI component name.

column.name: display_name
column.remarks: Value to be used as a visible text of UI component.

column.name: field_constraint_id
column.remarks: Field constraint ID.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the form historic table.

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

column.name: item_order
column.remarks: Field constraint option ordering number.

table.name: field_constraint_type
table.remarks: Reference table for the field constraint types, used in dynamic forms.

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the constraint type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the constraint type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the constraint type.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the constraint type.

table.name: field_payload
table.remarks: Dynamic form field payload.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Primary key.

column.name: name
column.remarks: Field name to be used as UI component name.

column.name: display_name
column.remarks: Value to be used as a visible text of UI component.

column.name: field_type
column.remarks: Field type code.

column.name: section_element_payload_id
column.remarks: Section element id.

column.name: string_payload
column.remarks: String field value.

column.name: big_decimal_payload
column.remarks: Decimal or integer field value.

column.name: boolean_payload
column.remarks: Boolean field value.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the form historic table.

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

column.name: item_order
column.remarks: Field ordering number.

table.name: field_template
table.remarks: Dynamic form field template.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Primary key.

column.name: name
column.remarks: Field name to be used as UI component name.

column.name: display_name
column.remarks: Value to be used as a visible text (header) of UI component.

column.name: hint
column.remarks: Field hint to be used for UI component.

column.name: field_type
column.remarks: Field type code.

column.name: section_template_id
column.remarks: Section template ID.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the form historic table.

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action

column.name: item_order

table.name: field_type
table.remarks: Reference table for the field types, used in dynamic forms.

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the field type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the field type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the field type.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the field type.

table.name: field_value_type
table.remarks: Reference table for the field value types, used in dynamic forms.

column.name: code

column.name: display_value

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the field value type.

column.name: description

table.name: form_payload
table.remarks: Dynamic form payload.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Primary key.

column.name: claim_id
column.remarks: Foreign key to the parent claim object.

column.name: form_template_name
column.remarks: Foreign key to relevant dynamic form template.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the form historic table.

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: form_template
table.remarks: Dynamic form template.

column.name: display_name
column.remarks: Form name, which can be used for displaying on the UI.

column.name: is_default
column.remarks: Indicates whether form is default for all new claims.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the form historic table.

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: party
table.remarks: Extension to the LADM used by SOLA to store party information (cliamant or owner).

column.name: id
column.remarks: Unique identifier for the party.

column.name: name
column.remarks: First name of party.

column.name: last_name
column.remarks: Last name of claimant.

column.name: id_type_code
column.remarks: ID document type code

column.name: id_number
column.remarks: ID document number.

column.name: birth_date
column.remarks: Date of birth of the party.

column.name: gender_code
column.remarks: Gender code of the party.

column.name: mobile_phone
column.remarks: Mobile phone number of the party.

column.name: phone
column.remarks: Landline phone number of the party.

column.name: email
column.remarks: Email address of the party.

column.name: address
column.remarks: Living address of the party.

column.name: user_name
column.remarks: User name who has created the record.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the document_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

column.name: is_person
column.remarks: Indicates if record is for individual or company (legal entity)

table.name: party_for_claim_share
table.remarks: Identifies parties involved in the claim share.

column.name: party_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the party.

column.name: claim_share_id
column.remarks: Identifier of the claim share.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the party_for_claim_share_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: rejection_reason
table.remarks: Rejection reason codes

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the rejection reason.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the rejection reason.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the rejection reason.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the rejection reason.

table.name: section_element_payload
table.remarks: Dynamic form section element payload.

column.name: section_payload_id
column.remarks: Section payload ID.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the form historic table.

column.name: rowversion

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user

column.name: change_time

table.name: section_payload
table.remarks: Dynamic form section payload.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Primary key.

column.name: name
column.remarks: Section name to be used as UI component name.

column.name: display_name
column.remarks: Value to be used as a visible text (header) of UI component.

column.name: element_name
column.remarks: Section element name to be used as UI component name.

column.name: element_display_name
column.remarks: Text value to be used as a visible label of the section element UI component.

column.name: min_occurrences
column.remarks: Minimum occurane of the section elements on the form.

column.name: max_occurrences
column.remarks: Maximum occurane of the section elements on the form. If max > 1, UI will be shown as a table.

column.name: form_payload_id
column.remarks: Foreign key reference to form payload.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the form historic table.

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

column.name: item_order
column.remarks: Section ordering number.

table.name: section_template
table.remarks: Sections of dynamic form template.

column.name: name
column.remarks: Section name to be used as UI component name.

column.name: display_name
column.remarks: Value to be used as a visible text (header) of UI component.

column.name: error_msg
column.remarks: Error message to show when min/max conditions are not met.

column.name: min_occurrences
column.remarks: Minimum occurane of the section elements on the form.

column.name: max_occurrences
column.remarks: Maximum occurane of the section elements on the form. If max > 1, UI will be shown as a table.

column.name: form_template_name
column.remarks: Foreign key reference to form template.

column.name: element_name
column.remarks: Section element name to be used as UI component name.

column.name: element_display_name
column.remarks: Text value to be used as a visible label of the section element UI component.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the form historic table.

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

column.name: item_order
column.remarks: Section ordering number.
